activities.project_name: Concept for AI supported tag search

activities.content: The workshop emphasized  critical role of data intelligence in tourism marketing, customer engagement, business planning. By integrating real-time insights, forecasting, + targeted campaigns, tourism stakeholders can  align  offerings with customer expectations / seasonal trends.
activities.name: update

activities.content:
Using data for marketing:
Booking window analysis per market.
Evolution of demand for hotels and vacation rentals, particularly in October and November.
activities.name: update

activities.content:
Business Applications of Data
Temperature and weather-based forecasting for public transport and street conditions.
Real-time data for segmenting tourists by origin and optimizing operational planning.
activities.name: update

activities.content:
Data Utilization for Market Research

Exploring data insights to enhance decision-making.
Understanding tourist behavior for tailored offerings.
Developing new autumn products based on market research.
activities.name: update

activities.content:
Customer-Centric Analysis

Impact of temperature, weather, and seasonal trends on customer behavior.
Importance of activities and Points of Interest (POIs), particularly indoor options.
Geolocation and availability of suppliers/POIs influencing customer choices.
activities.name: update

activities.content:
Key Themes:
Data-Driven Marketing and Customer Insights

Leveraging CRM for personalized marketing campaigns.
Understanding customer profiles to optimize marketing efforts.
Evaluating offers to ensure they trigger demand.
activities.name: update

Workshop Summary: Data Insights and Marketing in Tourism

activities.content: New: an **AI Coach** is available for everyone at project stage. Use the Team-builder to invite people to your challenge, and write a post to promote it! See also the [Introduction to Large Language Models](https://festival.tourismdata.ch/project/25).
activities.name: review

activities.content:
🅰️ℹ️ `Generated with GPT-4O-MINI`

Conduct a comprehensive evaluation of available AI tools capable of analyzing building images for accessibility features. Create a matrix comparing their strengths, weaknesses, and applicability across various structures. Collaborate with experts in accessibility and AI to refine criteria for the assessment. This will ensure a robust foundation for selecting the most effective tools, paving the way for accurate, automated data extraction that enhances transparency and accessibility for travelers with disabilities.
activities.name: review
